slides.title: Welcome to Key Discoveries
slides.content:
# Introduction to Key Discoveries

Welcome to **Key Discoveries** - the breakthroughs that changed everything!

## What You Will Learn:
- **Paradigm Shifts** - Revolutionary ideas
- **Accidental Discoveries** - Lucky findings
- **Technological Breakthroughs** - Enabling discoveries

> **Fun Fact:** Penicillin was discovered when a scientist left a petri dish uncovered!

slides.title: Physics Discoveries
slides.content:
# Physics Discoveries

## Gravity (1687):
- Newton's Principia
- Unified terrestrial and celestial

## Electromagnetism (1865):
- Maxwell's equations
- Light is EM wave

## X-rays (1895):
- Roentgen, accidental
- Medical imaging revolution

## Radioactivity (1896):
- Becquerel, Curie
- Led to nuclear physics

## Relativity (1905, 1915):
- Einstein
- Space, time, mass, energy

## Quantum Mechanics (1920s):
- Heisenberg, Schrodinger, Dirac
- Subatomic world

slides.title: Biology Discoveries
slides.content:
# Biology Discoveries

## Evolution (1859):
- Darwin's Origin of Species
- Natural selection
- All life connected

## DNA Structure (1953):
- Watson, Crick (with Franklin's data)
- Double helix
- Genetic code

## Antibiotics (1928):
- Penicillin (Fleming)
- Saved millions of lives

## Vaccination (1796):
- Jenner, smallpox
- Eradicated diseases

## Cell Theory (1838):
- All life made of cells
- Fundamental biology

slides.title: Chemistry and Technology
slides.content:
# Chemistry and Technology

## Periodic Table (1869):
- Mendeleev organized elements
- Predicted undiscovered elements

## Transistor (1947):
- Bell Labs
- Enabled modern electronics

## Internet (1969/1990s):
- ARPANET, then WWW
- Changed civilization

## CRISPR (2012):
- Gene editing tool
- Revolutionary for medicine

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Key Discoveries Summary

## Paradigm Shifts:
| Discovery | Impact |
|-----------|--------|
| Evolution | Origin of species |
| Relativity | Space-time |
| Quantum | Subatomic reality |
| DNA | Code of life |

## Technology Enablers:
- Microscope, telescope
- X-rays, MRI
- Computers, internet

## Accidental Discoveries:
- X-rays, penicillin, radioactivity

> **Congratulations!** You've completed Key Discoveries!
